price: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Ku yãƙi waɗanda suke kusantar* ku daga kãfirai. Kuma su sami tsanani daga gare ku. Kuma ku sani cẽwa Allah Yanã tãre da mãsu taƙawa.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُواْ فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَةٗۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: * Bayãnin yadda ake yin yãƙi ne; bã a fãɗa wa dukkan maƙiyã gabã ɗaya, na kusa da na nesa. Sai an fara da na kusa tukuna sa' nan nan a dinga fãɗaɗãwa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū qātilū alladhīna yalūnakum mina al-kufāri walyajidū fīkum ghil'ẓatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna
